messages.content: What is BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes repository about?
This repository stores custom nodes for ComfyUI created by BilboX.
What are the dependencies to install BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes?
To install BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes, you need a working installation of git.
How do I install BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes?

To install BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes, go to the custom-nodes directory, clone the repository, and restart ComfyUI interface by running `cd ComfyUI/custom-nodes && git clone https://github.com/syllebra/bilbox-comfyui.git`.
What is BilboX's PromptGeek Photo Prompt node?
BilboX's PromptGeek Photo Prompt node is created from PromptGeek's book data and provides a convenient way to compose photorealistic prompts into ComfyUI.
What preview modes does BilboX's PromptGeek Photo Prompt node offer?
BilboX's PromptGeek Photo Prompt node offers two preview modes: Tooltip mode and Modal mode.
What post-processing effects are included in BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes?
The post-processing effects included in BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes are the Vignette effect and LUT color correction.
How does BilboX's Vignette effect work?
BilboX's Vignette effect is a fix and improvement of EllangoK's ComfyUI-post-processing-nodes. It provides a vignette effect with two parameters: size and opacity.
How does BilboX's LUT color correction work?
BilboX's LUT color correction applies a LUT file as a post-processing effect in ComfyUI. You can specify the LUT file name and choose to setup the output in the log color space.
Who are the authors of BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes?
The code is created by BilboX, and the arts are by [@PromptGeek Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@PromptGeek).
Which versions of BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes are available?
The versions of BilboX's ComfyUI Custom Nodes available are 0.3, which adds post-processing effects like LUT color correction and Vignette effect, and 0.2, which includes an updated Readme.
